title: Mickey's Choo-Choo
brief_description: Mickey is a railroad engineer with an anthropomorphic locomotive. He feeds the train (coal), then feeds his dog, then makes lunch for himself. Minnie drops by and plays a tune on her fiddle while Mickey dances. After lunch, the train has trouble climbing a hill, and the last car with Minnie aboard detaches and runs away.

constellations_other.name: 9.5mm Pathe-Baby and parents behaving badly
constellations_other.description: A look at the link between the Path√©-Baby system and animation, as well as the relationship between cinematic parents and their children.
